issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Currently when we retrieve stats from the metastore for a column in a partitioned table, we will execute the logic to merge the column stats coming from each partition multiple times.
Even though we avoid multiple calls to metastore if the cache for the stats in enabled, merging the stats for a given column can take a large amount of time if there is a large number of partitions.
fields.summary: Cache merged column stats from retrieved partitions
